title:Just Another Team's MnK rolls - Season 5
description:Just Another Team's recommendations for Season 5. Recommended for Mouse and Keyboard.

//notes: tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=66875353&perks=965619221,1087426260,3300816228,2848615171

//notes: The only reason you should be using Avalanche for PvP is because you like the fact that it can roll with more open sights than Commemoration. In this case, you probably want a short zoom sight, or maybe one of the lower zoom medium scopes like SPO-57 FRONT or SPO-28 FRONT tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=66875353&perks=965619221,1561002382,2450788523,1890422124

//notes: Honestly, this archetype is just so bad everywhere and has been for a long time. Rapid Fire shotguns have a base mag of 7 so Slideshot loads two shells on activation. tags:pvp

dimwishlist:item=4292849692&perks=1926090094,106909392,1168162263,3038247973
dimwishlist:item=4292849692&perks=1926090093,106909392,1168162263,3038247973

//notes: Crimils is currently the max range 120 HC with RF and KC/Playload. However, the actual range benefits are pretty marginal since 40M is baseish range for 120s. You can go all in on range, but its not really necessary. One of two 120 handcannons which can still 2 tap. tags:god-pvp
